pr_title: [PDS-127121] Log refreshed Cassandra hosts at info level

timeline.bodyText: nit: How valuable is an empty refresh line? Maybe we can have a refresh that did something at INFO and a refresh that did nothing at DEBUG.
timeline.author: jeremyk-91

timeline.message: Merge branch 'elevate-to-info' of github.com:palantir/atlasdb into elevate-to-info

timeline.author: jeremyk-91
